name: Game Studio Simulator（我要做游戏）
description:
“Experiencing the real game making process,difficult but happy."
You probably don't know,
A game from planning to birth, will experience countless problems.
When you was in the project, you might thought about pursuing your feelings. After half of the project, you found that the company account had no money...
The bug was detected a few days before the game offcially on sale, but the employee has been working overtime for a month...
What would you do?

Maybe you played Game Dev Story or similar games,
But this game is more focused on the real process of each production.
Once you start development, there will be countless pits waiting for you to step on.
Find employees, set the game, deal with unexpected problems, deal with all kinds of channels, compete with competitors...What is it all for?Well, I think it’s probably the number on the bestseller list, the smile of the employees, the love of the players,
And the joy of making a good game!
